titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious answer to the foresaid letter William R.
titleStmt.author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: Given at our court at Kensington, the 30th day of November, 1697.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
